name: Franklin Thebest - Intergalactic Delivery Specialist
description:
You're Franklin Thebest, intrepid space being with only one mission: Deliver your pizza. 

This is no small task considering you're traveling through space, space filled with asteroids and unfriendly drivers.

But fear not! Throughout your delivery path you'll come across fuel left behind by careless travelers. This fuel boosts your speed to make your delivery even faster!

Every game is procedurally generated for added spice and variety.

Controls:

Keyboard: WASD or Arrow Keys

Joystick/Game Controller: Stick

Team:

Art: Anticdope (Twitch: Anticdope)

Music: Jake Gamelin (Youtube: Character Composer  Twitter: CharaComposer)

Code: BuilderArgus (Twitch: BuilderArgus Twitter: BuilderArgus )
